name: Ethnic Collections
overview:
Established in the year 2010, we, “Ethnic Collections”, have emerged as a prominent Chikan manufacturer and wholesaler of a wide range of Chikan Embroidery Dress Material, Sarees and Kurtis. Our collections spans from Chikan Embroidered Sarees, Dress Materials & Kurtis on fabrics like Cotton, Chiffon, Georgette, Chanderi, Super Net, Silk, Khadi, South Cotton etc.. with embellishments like Net, Crochia, Sequins, Pearls, Mukaish etc.

Infrastructure: In order to accomplish business operations in an effective manner, we have developed a sound infrastructure setup at Lucknow(India). To ensure hassle free process of production, we have segregated our setup in different units including manufacturing, quality testing and warehouse.

Quality Assurance: We work with a central aim to provide our clients with the qualitative range of Chikan Embroidery Dress Material, Sarees and Kurtis. To fulfill the same, we design our entire range using high-grade cotton, silk and other fabric and yarns that ensure high tearing strength, colorfastness and smooth texture. These fabrics and yarns are procured from the accredited vendors of the industry.

Our Team: We have a team of creative designers who innovatively design the entire collection of Chikan Embroidery Dress Material, Sarees and Kurtis. All our designers hold expertise and in-depth knowledge in their respective domains. Our designers keep close tap on ever changing market trends and design collection accordingly. Furthermore, all our business operations are carried out by our managers and administrators in the most competent manner, making us to achieve goals of the organization.

Client Satisfaction: Since inception, we give utmost priority towards maximizing contentment of the clients. We execute entire production and managerial activities in line with the client interests. Collection which we come up with is creatively designed as per the prevailing market trends.
